trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示處理 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging" /> 控制項之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging> event is raised when a Select button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Select") is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging>選取按鈕時引發事件 (具有按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為"Select") 按下時前,<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制處理選取的作業。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the selection operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消選取作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventHandler> 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventHandler> delegate to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何以程式設計方式加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventHandler>委派給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to declaratively add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventHandler> delegate to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何以宣告方式將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventHandler>委派給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。
